name: Star from the Bottom
description:
Help our mystical fish reach the stars

Be ready to become a small fish, one of the sons of the Sun and Moon. Since its abandonment by its parents and transformation into a fish, he has been living in the water of the Amazon Rainforest.

However, since the rainforest has become so polluted and attacked by fires and droughts, the fish decides to leave the Earth. In its journey, it will climb all the trees to reach the heavens and be reunited with its sisters, the stars.

Game Jam Themes:
  • Easy to play, hard to be good;
  • Back to the Future.
Game Jam Categorie:
  • Tales of Us - Sustainability
  • Climb the forest by charging your jumps;
  • Immersive music that evolves throughout the level;
  • Test your luck with the burned branches that appear and disappear.
Controls:
  • Move using the arrow keys or awsd
  • Charge the jump by holding the SpaceBar
A game by Marema Studios:
